previous.title: What is the impact of technology on labor and today’s workforce? Answer by @MaelleGavet, CEO @techstars. https://t.co/HOqC4pGr2F https://t.co/LQsJ5hGWik

localize.full_text: テクノロジーが労働や今日の労働力に与える影響とは？Answer by @MaelleGavet, CEO @techstars. https://t.co/HOqC4pGr2F https://t.co/LQsJ5hGWik
技术对劳工和当今劳动力的影响是什么？回答者：@MaelleGavet, CEO @techstars. https://t.co/HOqC4pGr2F https://t.co/LQsJ5hGWik
